definitions.definition: To exhibit the best attributes of something.
definitions.example: Grocery stores show off their produce by placing the most attractive specimens in front.

definitions.definition: To attract attention to for the purpose of bragging or personal exhibitionism; to demonstrate a skill, talent or property for the purpose of bragging or personal exhibitionism.
definitions.example: She loves to show off her driving prowess.
Quit being such a show-off, before someone gets hurt.
